title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: The dialog details have a few issues:
i. Duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page
ii. The first and second column could be merged
j.
EB:
There are a few issues with the dialog details:

a. The spacing between the button and the list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog.

b. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic.

c. Multiple selection should be allowed as move up/down can be applied to more than one item.

f. The signature preview must be a label that wraps.

h. It would be nice if the signature preview had the background color set to the same color as a hover.
